text: Yuen Long Nullah (元朗渠) is a nullah across western Yuen Long, Hong Kong. It starts off as a stream west of Tai Tong and flows north into Yuen Long Town. It then changes course to the northeast and connects with Shan Pui River. ==See also== *Rivers of Hong Kong ==References== *2007. 2007 Hong Kong Map.
